text: Klyapovo () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Klyapovskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 505 as of 2010. There are 8 streets. == Geography == It is located 5 km south-east from Beryozovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Klyapovo
